Install
```````


.. code:: bash

    `[sudo] pip install rstvalidator`

Usage
`````


.. code:: bash

    usage: python -m rstvalidator.cli path ...


Examples
````````


.. code:: bash

    $ python -m rstvalidator.cli README.rst
